attributes.action: Ban all cold-callers to mobile and landline phones.
attributes.additional_details: I am creating this e-petition in hopes that the Government will recognise 'Cold-Calling' as an issue which is close to harrassment. As well as unwelcome, 'cold-callers' seem to receive our numbers without our permission, which is an invasion of our privacy. Businesses should be made to declare how they acquire our numbers. This issue has grown significantly in recent months, and many people receive such calls on a daily basis. This must stop.
